name: Kakapo Castle
description:
Kākāpō Castle, is Primal Gaming's submission to MiniJam 99 - Birds!

It's a tower climb game built to meet both criteria of Birds and Don't Stop Moving.

I've had this concept in my head for years since a trip to New Zealand where I saw the HelloKiwi brand of merchandise. The Kākāpō image here was one of theirs. So when this MiniJam came along with 2 criteria that aligned perfectly, it wasn't a difficult choice to make to start work on it.

Kākāpō are a critically endangered flightless parrot from New Zealand with less than 250 left!

The music used was Wallpaper by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4604-wallpaper
